name: [DEMO] We Are Fantastic Architects: The WereGlitch Project
name_original: [DEMO] We Are Fantastic Architects: The WereGlitch Project
description:
We Are Fantastic Architects: The Were Glitch Project is about four architects building a castle in the sky for their mysterious client, the Witch. Little do they know they've been at this job for longer than it seems...

To play, download the executable file above to a windows machine, and run the .exe file inside to play! Let us know your thoughts on this demo at @CupboardBroom on twitter or anywhere else on social media.

Thank you for playing! <3
